title: Horsin’ Around
description: A young bachelor horse is forced to re-evaluate his priorities when he agrees to raise three human children.
quote: I’ve learned that when you’re in a loving family, there’s nothing wrong with a little horsin’ around.
altHero: the Horse gives a thumbs up and three happy children eat a giant ice cream sundae
alt1: the Horse looks disapprovingly at Sabrina whose hand is stuck in a candy dispensing machine
alt2: the Horse hugs his three kids
alt3: Olivia serves the Horse a roll of hay with a pitchfork
alt4: the Horse, Olivia, and Sabrina are covered in soap bubbles from an overflowing washing machine
